Title: Thumbelina
Writer: Hans Christian Andersen (original classic fairytale), Don Bluth (screenplay by)
Actors: Gino Conforti, Barbara Cook, Jodi Benson, Will Ryan
Plot: A girl no bigger than her mother's thumb feels all alone in the world knowing she is the only person her size. Her wish for a companion at last comes true when the prince of the fairy's arrives at her window sill. However, the naive Thumbelina's life goes downward from there when a toad kidnaps her. While she tries to find a way home, she begins to grow up and learns about hope with the help of the friends she always wanted.
Country: Ireland, USA, Canada, UK, Denmark, Spain, Poland, Hungary
